analyzed: vana majjhe rathesabha  yassa te khagga baddhassa
translated: in the middle of the forest,🔽when you were armed with a sword

when you threw a branch of a teak tree.”

analyzed: name namantassa bhaje bhajanta  kicca anukubbassa kareyya kicca
translated: “One should serve one who serves,🔽one should do a service for one who does a service;
One should do a favor for one who does a favor,

original: Asambhajantampi na sambhajeyya.🔽Caje cajantaṁ vanathaṁ na kayirā,
analyzed: a sambhajantam pi na sambhajeyya  caje cajantam vanatham na kayirā
translated: one should not serve one who does not serve.🔽One should not make a favor into a debt,
one should not serve one who has a mind gone elsewhere;

should seek another, so the world is great.”

looking at gratitude in the warrior,

analyzed: yassa icchasi tassa tuvam dadāmi iti
